title: Japan stocks higher at close of trade; Nikkei 225 up 1.05%
text:
© Reuters. Japan stocks higher at close of trade; Nikkei 225 up 1.05%

Investing.com – Japan stocks were higher after the close on Friday, as gains in the , and sectors led shares higher.

At the close in Tokyo, the added 1.05% to hit a new 3-months high.

The best performers of the session on the were Isetan Mitsukoshi Holdings Ltd. (T: ), which rose 5.24% or 44.0 points to trade at 883.0 at the close. Meanwhile, Yahoo Japan Corp. (T: ) added 4.92% or 15.0 points to end at 320.0 and Mitsui Fudosan Co., Ltd. (T: ) was up 4.67% or 115.5 points to 2586.5 in late trade.

The worst performers of the session were CyberAgent Inc (T: ), which fell 3.60% or 150.0 points to trade at 4015.0 at the close. NSK Ltd. (T: ) declined 2.71% or 27.0 points to end at 969.0 and Sumitomo Dainippon Pharma Co Ltd (T: ) was down 1.79% or 34.0 points to 1861.0.

Rising stocks outnumbered declining ones on the Tokyo Stock Exchange by 2300 to 1217 and 210 ended unchanged.

The , which measures the implied volatility of Nikkei 225 options, was unchanged 0.00% to 16.18.

Crude oil for October delivery was up 0.18% or 0.10 to $55.19 a barrel. Elsewhere in commodities trading, Brent oil for delivery in November rose 0.07% or 0.04 to hit $60.42 a barrel, while the December Gold Futures contract rose 0.15% or 2.25 to trade at $1509.65 a troy ounce.

USD/JPY was down 0.06% to 108.03, while EUR/JPY rose 0.31% to 119.93.

The US Dollar Index Futures was down 0.24% at 98.070.
description: Japan stocks higher at close of trade; Nikkei 225 up 1.05%
